entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as making two low bows to him, indicating that Harry is a person of importance.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is also mentioned as making two low bows to him, similar to Harry, indicating that Ron is another important person.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as receiving a funny little spasm in her direction, which might have been an attempt at a respectful salute, indicating that she is also an important person.

entities.name: harry and ron
entities.description: Harry and Ron are mentioned together as receiving two low bows from him, indicating that they are a group of people.

entities.name: him
entities.description: Him is mentioned as the one who is being watched by others, indicating that he is a person.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron received two low bows from him, indicating that they have a relationship with him.
Hermione received a funny little spasm in her direction from him, which might have been an attempt at a respectful salute, indicating that she has a relationship with him.
